name: Google Nano Banana Pro
tagline: Gemini 3 Pro Image Generator based on Google Nano Banana
description: Gemini 3 Pro Image. Create and edit images with Nano Banana Pro, for studio-quality levels of precision and control.

name: Dim Notes
tagline: Auto-tags your thoughts
description: Dim is a minimalist note app that auto-tags your notes. Just write. Your thoughts, ideas, and knowledge will connect the dots themselves.

name: BrandJet AI
tagline: Turn brand insights into outreach that moves fast
description: BrandJet is the mission control for outreach and brand intelligence. Run campaigns across email, LinkedIn, WhatsApp, and Instagram all in one place. Track any topic, brand, or competitor across the web with AI-powered sentiment analysis. See how people react, measure impact, and act on real insight â€” not noise. Outreach, analytics, and intelligence â€” unified.

name: Felo
tagline: The New Work: Visual collaboration workspace with AI agents
description: LiveDoc is the world's first AI Agent collaborative workspace that transforms static documents into evolving projects. Unlike traditional document tools, LiveDoc creates an intelligent canvas where humans and AI agents work together seamlessly.

name: ProspectEcho
tagline: Talk to companies running Facebook ads
description: ProspectEcho is the only tool that turns Facebook Ad Library searches into enriched lead lists in minutes. No coding or technical setup needed. Existing solutions require you to either: - Manually scrape for hours. - Learn automation tools like Apify/N8N. - Hire expensive VAs. We've made it dead simple: paste a search URL, wait a few minutes, download verified contact details. No other tool bridges the gap between manual work and complex automation this seamlessly.

name: DesignLumo
tagline: Generate editable designs & ads using gemini 3
description: DesignLumo turns your ideas into fully editable, ad-ready designs instead of flat AI images. It can understand layout, typography, and color structure for you, then gives you real design you can adjust. No digging through templates or rebuilding everything again in template apps. Type a prompt, get a polished design, tweak anything you want, and export.

name: Next3 Offload
tagline: Reduce image loading time by offloading media to the cloud.
description: The complete speed suite for WordPress. Offload media to 20+ S3 cloud providers (AWS, BunnyCDN, Wasabi, DigitalOcean, etc.), auto-compress images to WebP, and clean your database. Save server storage and boost PageSpeed scores instantly.

name: Yaranga
tagline: Turn your WhatsApp voice messages into notes and tasks
description: YarangaBot transforms your WhatsApp and Telegram voice messages and chat notes into clear, structured notes and actionable tasks. Just send your voice memo or message to Yaranga Save Bot and your AI assistant will: âœ… Transcribe your audio âœ… Extract key ideas and tasks âœ… Organize everything in your Yaranga workspace automatically Perfect for busy professionals, founders, creators, and anyone who lives in messengers.

name: Code Mode
tagline: Slash MCP token usage by 68%
description: LLMs are great at writing code but struggle with writing tool calls. Code Mode solves this by giving your model ONE powerful tool: a TypeScript execution sandbox with access to your entire toolkit. Complex, multi-step workflows thereby become a single batched execution. Independent studies show massive gains: 60% faster execution, 68% fewer tokens, 88% fewer round-trips, while Anthropic's research team found a massive reduction of 98.7% in token usage using CodeMode.

name: Ember
tagline: Describe your meals, track your calories
description: Simply describe what you eat and let AI track your calories automatically. Monitor your fasting periods, steps, and water intake

name: SuperIntern Translation
tagline: Real-time Translation AI, Live Notes & Instant Answers
description: SuperIntern is a real-time translation AI for meetings. Supports 50+ languages in and out, like English, Japanese, Chinese and Spanish. See dual subtitles, get live summaries in your preferred language, and start with 60 minutes free.

name: ThreadSignals
tagline: Warm leads from real conversationsâ€”not cold outreach
description: ThreadSignals helps founders, marketers, and agencies find real buying intent by surfacing conversations where people are actively asking for solutions. Unlike social listening tools that track sentiment or volume, ThreadSignals finds warm leadsâ€”posts where someone needs help right now. Just enter your keywords and instantly see conversations across different online communities.

name: watercooler.market
tagline: Polymarket for your slack channel
description: Turning office small talk into a competitive sport. It's prediction markets, but for the stuff that you actually care about - at least not crypto or politics. Just you, your coworkers, and the eternal question: will someone say 'circle back' in today's meeting? Turn your team's daily interactions into a competition. Gather your colleagues and create predictions with real market dynamics. Every Friday, your Chief Prediction Officer gets crowned. No real money, just pure team engagement.

name: Free E-Book How To Grow On X
tagline: How I Got 6M Impressions on X And Made Sales In 2 Weeks
description: Learn how to launch your SaaS and build an audience in 30 days. Get 6M impressions and make sales in 2 weeks after launch. No ads. Two e-books bundle with proven strategies.

name: DataSet toolset
tagline: Set of tools to work with data, lists and code
description: Set of minimalistic online tools to work with datasets, lists, code and files in different formats JSON, CSV, XML, MySQL, HTML or plain text. Tools included can convert, merge, split, validate, compare, edit, beautify, prettify and minify code and data.

name: duration.ai
tagline: Turn anything into a fun, adaptive learning plan
description: Duration lets you learn anything in a way thatâ€™s effective and most importantly fun. You can listen to audio guides, check out articles, or watch short-form videos. Plus, it's the first learning product to constantly assess your understanding. Duration builds an entire personalised study plan for you based on your experience, time and personal learning style. It's free to use today.

name: Chini.Fit - Find Hidden Sugar in Meals
tagline: Your Personalized AI Meal Analyzer for Sugar & Health ðŸ¥˜
description: Chini.fit is a personalized AI meal analyzer focused on sugar and metabolic health, not just calories. Unlike tracking apps, you simply share a meal photo or description and get instant, easy-to-understand feedback, pattern insights, small swap suggestions, and pre and post meal strategies. This launch is an early hackathon-built MVP to test a low-friction, coaching-like experience without manual logging.

name: better-env
tagline: A Secure, Developer-Friendly Alternative to .env
description: better-env is a CLI tool that manages environment variables securely using OpenPGP encryption. Store secrets once in a global encrypted store, link them to projects via commit-safebetter-env files, and load them at runtime, no plaintext to be found anywhere.

name: Picbolt
tagline: Screenshot editor & design tool for mockups
description: Create stunning screenshots, mockups, and designs with Picbolt's all-in-one design platform. Transform your images with beautiful backgrounds, device frames, and professional effects. Features include code snippets styling, social media mockups, testimonial generators, and more. Free online tool with no design skills required.

name: Ai Game Generator
tagline: AI Game Generator â€“ Promptâ€‘toâ€‘HTML5 Game Builder
description: AI Game Generator is an AI-powered game generation platform that quickly converts text descriptions into playable HTML5 games. Supports multiple AI models. Perfect for game developers, designers, and creative professionals seeking efficient prototype development.
